description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a0bc5","text":"This Protocol is adapted from Lee et a. (2018) (https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0092867418302976?via%3Dihub)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":78}],"data":{}},{"key":"bmmc9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1keod","text":"The authors have established organoids from clusters of bladder cancer cells after TURB. They use a medium with CS-FCS and EGF and culture the organoids as a sandwich in matrigel, The effiency was around 70%, genomics were comparable to the parental tumour but phenotypically the organoids tended to evolve into basal cells even when arising from a tumour with a luminal phenotype.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gq47","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5142E17E48D011EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0092867418302976?via%3Dihub"}}}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6da6k","text":"Lee Organoid Medium:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9u5lt","text":"Hepatocyte media with 10 ng/ml EGF, 5% CS-FBS, 10 μM Y-27632 (STEMCELL Technologies), and 1X Glutamax (GIBCO)), supplemented with 1x Zellshield.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asri0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvk90","text":"HBSS Washing Solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l50m","text":"   supplemented with 5% CS-FBS, 10 μM of the ROCK inhibitor Y-27632 and 1x Zellshield.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3q890","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"419BA870341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"HBSS with 10 mM HEPES, Without Phenol Red 500 mL\r","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"37150","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.stemcell.com/products/hbss-with-10-mm-hepes-without-phenol-red.html","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.stemcell.com/","name":"STEMCELL Technologies Inc."}}}}}
